# Tool With License

This document includes the optional LICENSE section.

## Installation

Quick installation:

```bash
go get -u github.com/example/licensed-tool
```

## Usage

Example usage:

```go
package main

func main() {
    // First example
}
```

```go
package main

func secondExample() {
    // Second example
}
```
